Body:
actual = MarkovChain(p).pi
expected = [np.array(steady_state) for steady_state in steady_states]
matches = 0
for a in actual:
    for e in expected:
        matches += 1 if np.allclose(a, e, rtol=0.0, atol=1e-06) else 0
assert matches == len(expected)
mark.parametrize(argnames=('p', 'steady_states'), argvalues=cases, ids=[str
    (i + 1) for i in range(len(cases))])
